trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control with respect to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that the control implements.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.

Tick marks appear above and below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> bar for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left and right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.

Tick marks appear below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.

Tick marks appear above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
